mapper.select: select * from room order by room_num

select room_num, room_type_num, room_name from (select room_num, room_type_num, room_name from room where room_num in (select room_num from room where place_num=#{place_num})) a where a.room_num not in (select room_num from reservation where(#{reservation_checkin_date} between to_char(reservation_checkin_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(reservation_checkout_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) or (#{reservation_checkout_date} between to_char(reservation_checkin_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(reservation_checkout_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and place_num=#{place_num})
